trans-unit.source: Associates a source table with a table in a <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" />, and is implemented by the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping" /> class, which is used in common by .NET Framework data providers.
trans-unit.target: 将源表与 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" /> 中的表关联，并由 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping" /> 类实现，该类由 .NET Framework 数据提供程序共同使用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.ITableMapping> interface allows an inheriting class to implement a TableMapping class, which associates a data source column with a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> column.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.ITableMapping>接口允许继承类实现一个 TableMapping 类，该类将使用的数据源列相关联<xref:System.Data.DataSet>列。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [DataAdapter DataTable and DataColumn Mappings](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-datatable-and-datacolumn-mappings.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[DataAdapter 数据表和 DataColumn 映射](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-datatable-and-datacolumn-mappings.md)。

trans-unit.source: An application does not create an instance of the <xref:System.Data.ITableMapping> interface directly, but creates an instance of a class that inherits <xref:System.Data.ITableMapping>.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序不会创建的实例<xref:System.Data.ITableMapping>接口直接，但创建继承的类的实例<xref:System.Data.ITableMapping>。

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit <xref:System.Data.ITableMapping> must implement the inherited members, and typically define additional members to add provider-specific functionality.
trans-unit.target: 继承的类<xref:System.Data.ITableMapping>必须实现继承的成员，且通常定义其他成员来添加提供程序特定的功能。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Data.ITableMapping> interface defines the <xref:System.Data.ITableMapping.DataSetTable%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Data.ITableMapping>接口定义<xref:System.Data.ITableMapping.DataSetTable%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: In turn, the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping> class inherits this property, and also defines the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping.GetDataTableBySchemaAction%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 反过来，<xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping>类继承此属性，还定义<xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping.GetDataTableBySchemaAction%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an instance of the derived class, <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping>, and adds it to a <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建的派生类中，实例<xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping>，并将其添加到<xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection>集合。

trans-unit.source: It then informs the user that the mapping was added to the collection and displays the parent mapping.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它通知用户映射添加到集合，并显示其父映射。

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from the <see cref="T:System.Data.ITableMapping" /> interface, you should implement the following constructors:
trans-unit.target: 继承自<see cref="T:System.Data.ITableMapping" />接口，则应实现以下构造函数：

trans-unit.source: <list type="table"><listheader><term> Item
trans-unit.target: <list type="table"><listheader><term> 项

trans-unit.source: </term><description> Description
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 描述

trans-unit.source: </description></listheader><item><term> DataTableMapping()
trans-unit.target: </description></listheader><item><term> DataTableMapping()

trans-unit.source: </term><description> Initializes a new instance of the TableMapping class.
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 初始化 TableMapping 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term> TableMapping(string sourceTable, string dataSetTable)
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term> TableMapping （字符串 sourceTable，字符串 dataSetTable）

trans-unit.source: </term><description> Initializes a new instance of the TableMapping class with a source when given a source table name and a <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> name.
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 初始化一个的源的 TableMapping 类的新实例，在给定源表名称和<see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" />名称。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term> TableMapping(string sourceTable, string dataSetTable, DataColumnMapping[] columnMappings)
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term> TableMapping （字符串 sourceTable、 字符串 dataSetTable、 DataColumnMapping [] columnMappings）

trans-unit.source: </term><description> Initializes a new instance of the TableMapping class when given a source table name, a <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> name, and an array of ColumnMapping objects.
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 初始化时提供源表名称，TableMapping 类的新实例<see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" />名称和 ColumnMapping 对象的数组。

trans-unit.source: Gets the derived <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> 的派生 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: A collection of data column mappings.
trans-unit.target: 数据列映射集合。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an instance of the derived class, <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping>, sets some of its properties, and copies its <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping.ColumnMappings%2A> to an array.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建的派生类中，实例<xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping>，设置其属性和副本的一些其<xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping.ColumnMappings%2A>到一个数组。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that a <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection> has been created.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定<xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection>已创建。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the case-insensitive name of the table within the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" /> 中不区分大小写的表名。

trans-unit.source: The case-insensitive name of the table within the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" /> 内的表的不区分大小写的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the case-sensitive name of the source table.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置区分大小写的源表名称。

trans-unit.source: The case-sensitive name of the source table.
trans-unit.target: 区分大小写的源表名称。
